# Image.ResizingMode.tile

**Case**

A mode to repeat the image at its original size, as many times as necessary to fill the available space.

## Declaration

```swift
case tile
```

## Getting resizing modes

- **Image.ResizingMode.stretch**: A mode to enlarge or reduce the size of an image so that it fills the available space.

items.description: A mode to enlarge or reduce the size of an image so that it fills the available space.
items.name: Image.ResizingMode.stretch
